startMessage: Welcome to Spoonacular - we are excited to serve you with some delicious recipes!!!
inputRequest: Please enter ingredient of your choice:
ingredientsContinue: Do you wish to add more ingredients? Enter (yes/y) to continue else (no/n):
continue: Do you wish to continue? Press (yes/y) to continue else (no/n) to stop shopping anytime:
invalidInput: Oops! It seems you mistyped something there, please reenter your choice
getRecipes: Great! You entered these ingredients {ingredient_list}, sit back and relax while we get our best recipes just for you!
invalidIngredient: Oops! It seems you missed entering your ingredient.
recipeLikeDislike: Did you like this recipe? Press (yes/y) if you did else (no/n) to see new recipes, else enter (exit/EXIT) anytime:
thankYouShopping:
Thank you for checking out our recipes and shopping with us. You checked {total_count} of our recipes and liked {liked_count} of them. 
We hope you'll come back to check more recipes, until then, Goodbye!!
